plot: After the murder of her boyfriend a teenage girl is left lonely, isolated and unable to express her anguish. Finding a release through self harm, she becomes obsessed with the apparent power of a knife.
title: Cold Kiss
plot_es: After the murder of her boyfriend a teenage girl is left lonely, isolated and unable to express her anguish. Finding a release through self harm, she becomes obsessed with the apparent power of a knife.
plot_en: After the murder of her boyfriend a teenage girl is left lonely, isolated and unable to express her anguish. Finding a release through self harm, she becomes obsessed with the apparent power of a knife.
